channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Orban Invites Netanyahu to Hungary, Flouting I.C.C. Arrest Warrant
item.description: Hungary, unlike the United States, is a signatory to the court, which accused the Israeli leader of war crimes in Gaza. Responses to the warrant from ...

item.title: Trump chooses Bessent to be treasury secretary, Vought as budget chief, Chavez-DeRemer for Labor
item.description: Bessent, 62, is the founder of hedge fund Key Square Capital Management, after having worked on-and-off for Soros Fund Management since 1991. If confi...

item.title: Election Myths, Traps, Truths and Lessons
item.description: We won’t have enough data to tell the full story of the election for some time. But there are a few things we can say for sure now.

item.title: 55 Days Into Hunger Strike, Activist’s Mother Says She ‘Won’t Back Down’
item.description: Laila Soueif, the British-born mother of the Egyptian political prisoner Alaa Abd El Fattah, is demanding the U.K. do more to secure his release.

item.title: A Lesson for America? Reversing Populist Policies Is Tough, Poland Finds.
item.description: The country’s new leaders are trying to undo changes, like abortion restrictions and politicized courts, made by their hard-right predecessors. It “ta...

item.title: Ex-N.Y.P.D. Officer Convicted of Sex Offenses Involving 4 Underage Boys
item.description: Christopher Terranova, a former officer from Staten Island, was accused of preying on teenage boys on Snapchat, including one whom he met when the chi...

item.title: Trump team prepares to announce Scott Bessent as Treasury pick
item.description: Bessent, 62, served as a key economic adviser to Trump during the campaign, promoting his agenda and crafting policy speeches.

item.title: Formula for Power in Modi’s India: Cash, Detentions and Luxe Resorts
item.description: With a tactic known as “resort politics,” Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party has been accused of using brute force to take over Indian state governm...

item.title: Nvidia’s stock surge means CEO’s foundation must double giving
item.description: The Jen-Hsun & Lori Huang Foundation saw its assets, which mostly consist of Nvidia shares, more than triple to $3.4 billion at the end of 2023.

item.title: 55 Days Into Hunger Strike, Activist’s Mother Says She ‘Won’t Back Down’
item.description: Laila Soueif, the British-born mother of the Egyptian political prisoner Alaa Abd El Fattah, is demanding the U.K. do more to secure his release.

item.title: Trump Taps Investor Scott Bessent as Treasury Secretary
item.description: The hedge fund manager will be responsible for steering President-elect Donald J. Trump’s unconventional economic agenda.

item.title: You can now cheat on your spouse without breaking the law in New York— a century-old adultery ban was just repealed
item.description: No one really knew about it or enforced it anyway.

item.title: Merkel Memoir Recalls What It Was Like Dealing With Trump and Putin
